summary.span: 實作文字控制項要求的基本功能。

span.span: Implements the basic functionality required by text controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別會實作核心功能的文字操作控制項，例如和。This class implements the core features of text manipulation controls, such as and . 這些包括文字選取範圍，**剪貼簿**功能、 多行文字方塊控制項支援，以及許多事件。These include text selection, **Clipboard** functionality, multiline text control support, and many events. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用、 衍生類別，以建立多行具有垂直捲軸控制項。The following code example uses , a derived class, to create a multiline control with vertical scroll bars. 此範例也會使用， ，和屬性，使多行文字方塊控制項適用於建立文字文件。This example also uses the , , and properties to make the multiline text box control useful for creating text documents. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性也必須`true`取得控制項中的定位字元。The property must also be `true` to get a TAB character in the control. 如果屬性設定為`true`，使用者必須按下 CTRL + TAB 鍵將焦點移至定位順序中的下一個控制項。If the property is set to `true`, the user must press CTRL+TAB to move the focus to the next control in the tab order. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用、 衍生類別，以建立多行具有垂直捲軸控制項。The following code example uses , a derived class, to create a multiline control with vertical scroll bars. 此範例也會使用， ，和屬性，使多行文字方塊控制項適用於建立文字文件。This example also uses the , , and properties to make the multiline text box control useful for creating text documents. span.span: Appends text to the current text of a text box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個方法將文字加入至現有的文字，而不是使用串連運算子 （+） 來串連文字控制項中以屬性。You can use this method to add text to the existing text in the control instead of using the concatenation operator (+) to concatenate text to the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法和屬性來從其中一個複製文字到另一個。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method and the property to copy text from one to another. 這個範例需要有兩個控制項名為，`textBox1`和`textBox2`，已新增至表單，`textBox1`文字指派給其屬性。This example requires that two controls named, `textBox1` and `textBox2`, have been added to a form and that `textBox1` has text assigned to its property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您將屬性`true`如，當變更，展開或合約以配合放大或縮小文字。When you set the property to `true` for a , when the changes, the expands or contracts the to accommodate the larger or smaller text. 的不會變更。The of the does not change. 如果您想要變更控制項的大小，在使用者輸入文字，您可以使用控制，並使用其事件來變更其大小。If you want to change the size of the control as the user enters text, you can use a control and use its event to change its size. ## Examples 這個範例假設您的表單具有兩個文字方塊中，兩個按鈕，並針對每個按鈕的 click 事件。This example assumes that you have a form with two text boxes, two buttons, and click events for each of the buttons. 此範例示範屬性設定為`true`一個文字方塊和`false`其他。The example demonstrates the property by setting it to `true` for one text box and `false` for the other. 按一下其中一個按鈕的文字方塊會填入一個較小的文字，而且當您按一下其他按鈕的文字方塊會填入較大的文字。When you click one button the text boxes are filled with a smaller text, and when you click the other button the text boxes are filled with larger text. 文字方塊具有設`true`會展開以容納較大的文字的高度。The text box that has set to `true` expands in height to accommodate the larger text. 寬度不會變更。The width does not change. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用屬性來變更背景色彩的文字控制項融入您的表單的色彩配置。You can use the property to change the background color of the text control to blend into the color scheme of your forms. 若要變更控制項中文字的色彩，請使用屬性。To change the color of the text within the control, use the property. 設定時屬性的文字控制項，可讓您確認您選擇的色彩不會消失控制項的文字。When setting the property of your text control, ensure that the color you choose does not cause the text of the control to disappear. 例如，如果和屬性都設定為`Color.Black`，將不會顯示文字方塊控制項中的文字。For example, if the and properties are both set to `Color.Black`, the text within your textbox control will not be visible. 這個屬性可能會透過寫如果屬性設`true`。This property might be over ridden if the property of the is set to `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此方法傳回`true`，您可以呼叫方法來復原上一個作業中的文字。If this method returns `true`, you can call the method to undo the last operation in a text box. 您可以使用這個方法在事件，或管理的按鈕狀態的程式碼中啟用或停用復原先前的作業中的文字方塊控制項的能力。You can use this method in the event of a , or in code that manages the state of buttons on a to enable or disable the ability to undo the previous operation in a text box control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用、 衍生的類別。The following code example uses , a derived class. 它提供事件處理常式剪下、 複製、 貼上，執行的物件，以及恢復作業。It provides event handlers for objects that perform Cut, Copy, Paste, and Undo operations. 這個範例需要控制項，名為`textBox1`已建立。This example requires that a control named `textBox1` has been created. summary.span: 將所有文字從文字方塊控制項清除。

span.span: Clears all text from the text box control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個方法，以清除控制項，而不是指派的內容屬性是空字串。You can use this method to clear the contents of the control instead of assigning the property an empty string. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用、 衍生類別，以建立事件處理常式事件。The following code example uses , a derived class, to create an event handler for the event. 事件處理常式中的程式碼會將資料限制為數字。The code within the event handler restricts data to numbers. 在控制項中輸入文字之後，程式碼會判斷是否輸入的文字是數字。After text has been entered in the control, the code determines if the text entered is a number. 如果文字不是數字，該程式碼會清除從控制項的文字和顯示來提醒使用者接受的數字。If the text is not a number, the code clears the text from the control and a is displayed to alert the user that only numbers are accepted. 這個範例需要`Boolean`名為變數`flag`和控制項稱為`textBox1`定義在這個方法。The example requires that a `Boolean` variable named `flag` and a control called `textBox1` are defined outside of this method. 這個範例示範如何使用旗標變數，以避免中的階層式事件事件。This example demonstrates how to use a flag variable to avoid a cascading event in the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用屬性來變更以符合您的表單上其他控制項的文字在控制項中文字的色彩。You can use the property to change the color of the text within the control to match the text of other controls on your form. 您也可以使用這個屬性來反白顯示特定的文字方塊中包含無效的值。You can also use this property to highlight a specific text box that contains an invalid value. 若要變更控制項的背景色彩，請使用屬性。To change the background color of the control, use the property. 設定時屬性的文字控制項，可讓您確認您選擇的色彩不會消失控制項的文字。When setting the property of your text control, ensure that the color you choose does not cause the text of the control to disappear. 例如，如果和屬性都設定為`Color.Black`，將不會顯示文字方塊控制項中的文字。For example, if the and properties are both set to `Color.Black`, the text within your textbox control will not be visible. 這個屬性可能會透過寫如果屬性設`true`。This property might be over ridden if the property of the is set to `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的位置`pt`參數超出控制項字串中指定的點最接近的第一個字元的工作區`pt`傳回。If the location specified in the `pt` parameter is outside the client area of the control, the first character of the string closest to the point specified in `pt` is returned. 您可以使用這個方法來判斷哪些字元位於接近控制項內的特定時間點。You can use this method to determine which characters are located near a specific point within the control. 您接著可以使用此值在該位置的文字上執行作業。You can then use this value to perform operations on the text at that location. > [!NOTE] > 如果指定的位置中`pt`參數位於右邊的控制項，也就是最後一個字元的字串中指定的點最接近的用戶端區域`pt`傳回。If the specified location in the `pt` parameter is located on the right side of the client area of the control, the last character of the string closest to the point specified in `pt` is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回最接近指定位置的字元索引`pt`參數。This method returns the character index that is closest to the position specified in the `pt` parameter. 字元索引為起始的索引中的控制項，包括空格的文字。The character index is a zero-based index of text in the control, including spaces. 您可以使用這個方法，以判斷其中文字中的使用者將滑鼠移過將滑鼠座標傳遞至這個方法。You can use this method to determine where in the text the user has the mouse over by passing the mouse coordinates to this method. 這可以是如果您想要執行的工作，使用者將滑鼠指標置於控制項的文字中的字時很有用。This can be useful if you want to perform tasks when the user rests the mouse pointer over a word in the text of the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果指定的位置不是控制項的用戶端矩形內，或超出控制項中的最後一個字元，則傳回的值會是最後一個字元的索引。If the specified location is not within the client rectangle of the control, or is beyond the last character in the control, the return value is the index of the last character.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [文字] 方塊中的行號從零開始。Line numbering in the text box starts at zero. 如果`lineNumber`參數大於中文字方塊的最後一行傳回-1。If the `lineNumber` parameter is greater than the last line in the text box, returns -1. 傳回實體的一行的第一個字元索引。 returns the first character index of a physical line. 實體的行是顯示的行，而不是指派的行。The physical line is the displayed line, not the assigned line. 顯示的行數可能會大於因為自動換行的指定行數。The number of displayed lines can be greater than the number of assigned lines due to word wrap. 比方說，如果您指派至兩個長行控制以及設定和至`true`，兩個長指派的線條會產生四個實體 （或顯示線條）。For example, if you assign two long lines to a control and set and to `true`, the two long assigned lines result in four physical (or displayed lines).

span.span: The value of the parameter is less than zero.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可讓您判斷在指定的字元索引為基礎的行號`index`方法的參數。This method enables you to determine the line number based on the character index specified in the `index` parameter of the method. 控制項中文字的第一行會傳回值為零。The first line of text in the control returns the value zero. 方法傳回的實體的行號索引的字元所在控制項中。The method returns the physical line number where the indexed character is located within the control. 例如，如果第一個邏輯程式敘述行中的文字部分控制項換行至下一行，方法會傳回 1，如果第二個實體的行換行字元的指定的索引處的字元。For example, if a portion of the first logical line of text in the control wraps to the next line, the method returns 1 if the character at the specified character index has wrapped to the second physical line. 如果設`false`、 行的任何部分換行至下一步，而且方法會傳回 0，表示指定的字元索引。If is set to `false`, no portion of the line wraps to the next, and the method returns 0 for the specified character index. 您可以使用這個方法來判斷哪一行特定的字元索引位於內。You can use this method to determine which line a specific character index is located within. 例如，在呼叫之後方法來搜尋的文字，您可以取得找到的搜尋結果的字元索引。For example, after calling the method to search for text, you can obtain the character index to where the search results are found. 您可以呼叫這個方法所傳回的字元索引與找不到方法，以判斷這行文字。You can call this method with the character index returned by the method to determine which line the word was found. > [!NOTE] > 如果在指定的字元索引`index`參數超出可用的控制項中包含的行數，會傳回最後一個行號。If the character index specified in the `index` parameter is beyond the available number of lines contained within the control, the last line number is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 陣列中的每個項目會變成文字方塊控制項中文字行。Each element in the array becomes a line of text in the text box control. 如果文字方塊控制項的屬性設定為`true`和文字顯示新行字元、 新行字元之後的文字加入新陣列中的項目，並顯示在個別行上。If the property of the text box control is set to `true` and a newline character appears in the text, the text following the newline character is added to a new element in the array and displayed on a separate line. > [!NOTE] > 根據預設，線條的集合是唯讀複本中線條的。By default, the collection of lines is a read-only copy of the lines in the . 若要取得的線條可寫入的集合，使用程式碼如下所示： `textBox1.Lines = new string[] { "abcd" };`To get a writable collection of lines, use code similar to the following: `textBox1.Lines = new string[] { "abcd" };` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用、 衍生類別，以擷取多行文字方塊控制項中的所有文字字串，並將它們顯示使用方法。The following code example uses , a derived class, to extract all strings of text from a multiline text box control and displays them using the method. 這個範例需要已經建立控制項，名為`textBox1`，且已填入的文字行。This example requires that a control has been created, named `textBox1`, and that it has been filled with lines of text. [!code-cpp[Classic TextBoxBase.Lines Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBoxBase.Lines Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic TextBoxBase.Lines Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBoxBase.Lines Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic TextBoxBase.Lines Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBoxBase.Lines Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定使用者能夠輸入或貼入文字方塊控制項中的最大字元數。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of characters the user can type or paste into the text box control.

value.span: 可以輸入控制項中的字元數。

span.span: The number of characters that can be entered into the control.

value.span: 預設值為 32767。

span.span: The default is 32767.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性，或限制的輸入資料時資料庫中輸入的文字長度來限制在控制項中輸入的值，例如郵遞區號和電話號碼、 文字的長度。You can use this property to restrict the length of text entered in the control for values such as postal codes and telephone numbers, or to restrict the length of text entered when the data is to be entered in a database. 您可以限制的最大長度，在資料庫中對應欄位的輸入控制項的文字。You can limit the text entered into the control to the maximum length of the corresponding field in the database. > [!NOTE] > 在程式碼中，您可以設定的值屬性值的長度大於所指定的值，這個值以屬性。In code, you can set the value of the property to a value that has a length greater than the value specified by the property. 這個屬性只會影響執行階段輸入控制項的文字。This property only affects text entered into the control at run time. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用衍生的類別， ，以建立用來接受密碼文字方塊。The following code example uses the derived class, , to create a text box that is used to accept a password. 這個範例會使用以大寫輸入變更的所有字元的屬性和屬性，以將密碼長度限制為 8 個字元。This example uses the property to change all characters typed to uppercase and the property to restrict the password length to eight characters. 此範例也會使用屬性中心中的密碼控制項。This example also uses the property to center the password in the control. [!code-cpp[Classic TextBoxBase.MaxLength Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBoxBase.MaxLength Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic TextBoxBase.MaxLength Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBoxBase.MaxLength Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic TextBoxBase.MaxLength Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBoxBase.MaxLength Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出在建立控制項或者上次設定其內容後，文字方塊控制項被使用者修改過。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates that the text box control has been modified by the user since the control was created or its contents were last set.

value.span: 如果控制項的內容已修改過，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the control's contents have been modified; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性來判斷使用者是否已修改文字方塊控制項的內容。You can use this property to determine if the user has modified the contents of the text box control. 您也可以設定這個屬性來表示，已變更文字方塊控制項的應用程式的程式碼中。You can also set this property in code to indicate that changes were made to the text box control by the application. 這個屬性可以用於驗證和資料儲存方法判斷文字方塊控制項中所做變更，如此才能驗證或儲存變更的內容。This property can be used by validation and data-saving methods to determine if changes were made in a text box control so the changed contents can be validated or saved. 如果您變更屬性以程式設計的方式，屬性還原成`false`。If you change the property programmatically, the property reverts to `false`. 這不會引發事件。This does not raise the event. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用事件、 衍生類別，以判斷內容控制項已填入資料之後，變更控制項。The following code example uses the event for a , a derived class, to determine if the contents of the control have changed since the control was filled with data. 此範例會使用字串來儲存控制項的原始內容，並進行比較的內容來判斷是否已變更內容。The example uses a string to store the original contents of the control and compares it against the contents of the to determine if the contents have changed. 如果內容已變更，屬性設定為`true`。If the contents have changed, the property is set to `true`. 否則，它會重設，為`false`。Otherwise, it is reset to `false`. 這個範例需要控制項，名為`textBox1`已建立且`String`名為變數`originalText`已建立儲存的原始文字控制項。This example requires that a control named `textBox1` has been created and that a `String` variable named `originalText` has been created to store the original text for the control. [!code-cpp[Classic TextBoxBase.Modified Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBoxBase.Modified Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic TextBoxBase.Modified Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBoxBase.Modified Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic TextBoxBase.Modified Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBoxBase.Modified Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出這是否為多行文字方塊控制項。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this is a multiline text box control.

value.span: 如果是多行文字方塊控制項，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the control is a multiline text box control; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 多行文字方塊中，可讓您在控制項中顯示多行的文字。A multiline text box allows you to display more than one line of text in the control. 如果屬性設定為`true`，在多行文字方塊中輸入的文字換行至下一行控制項中。If the property is set to `true`, text entered into the multiline text box is wrapped to the next line in the control. 如果屬性設定為`false`，輸入新行字元之前，將在同一行顯示多行文字方塊控制項中輸入的文字。If the property is set to `false`, text entered into the multiline text box control will be displayed on the same line until a newline character is entered. 下列可用來當作新行字元：The following can be used as newline characters: - - ControlChars.CrLfControlChars.CrLf - vbCrLf (僅限 Visual Basic)vbCrLf (Visual Basic only) 您可以加入文字 方塊中，使用捲軸屬性來顯示水平和/或垂直捲軸。You can add scroll bars to a text box using the property to display horizontal and/or vertical scroll bars. 這可讓使用者捲動文字超出控制項的維度。This allows the user to scroll through the text that extends beyond the dimensions of the control. > [!NOTE] > 因為預設值的屬性是`false`的預設大小即使您調整的大小會根據字型大小。Because the default value of the property is `false`, the default size of a will be in accordance with the font size even if you resize the . 若要取得針對大小一致您，將其屬性`true`。To get a consistent size for your , set its property to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 在日文作業系統，如果屬性設定為`true`，設定屬性會顯示密碼，進而危損害系統安全性的文字。On Japanese operating systems, if the property is set to `true`, setting the property will display the text of the password, thus compromising system security. 因此，日文作業系統在系統上，設定屬性`false`如果您設定屬性。Therefore, on Japanese operating systems, set the property to `false` if you set the property. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性設定為`false`依預設，所有衍生類別，除了控制項。This property is set to `false` by default for all derived classes, with the exception of the control. 如控制項，屬性會影響是否控制項將會自動調整大小，，如下所示：For a control, the property affects whether or not the control will automatically resize, as follows: - 如果設`true`和設`true`，並不會自動調整大小。If is set to `true` and is set to `true`, will not automatically resize. - 如果設`true`和設`false`，將自動調整大小。If is set to `true` and is set to `false`, will automatically resize. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用、 衍生類別，以建立多行具有垂直捲軸控制項。The following code example uses , a derived class, to create a multiline control with vertical scroll bars. 此範例也會使用， ，和屬性，使多行文字方塊控制項適用於建立文字文件。This example also uses the , , and properties to make the multiline text box control useful for creating text documents. remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

summary.span: 捲動控制項的內容至目前插入號 (Caret) 所在位置。

span.span: Scrolls the contents of the control to the current caret position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可讓您捲動控制項的內容，直到插入號是控制項的可見區域內。This method enables you to scroll the contents of the control until the caret is within the visible region of the control. 如果插入號位於以下控制項的可見區域方法將捲動控制項的內容，直到插入號會顯示在控制項底部。If the caret is positioned below the visible region of the control, the method will scroll the contents of the control until the caret is visible at the bottom of the control. 如果插入號位於上述控制項的可見區域，這個方法會捲動控制項的內容，直到插入號會顯示在控制項的頂端。If the caret is positioned above the visible region of the control, this method scrolls the contents of the control until the caret is visible at the top of the control. 您可以使用這個方法在多行文字方塊中，以確保目前文字項目點內控制項的可見區域。You can use this method in a multiline text box to ensure that the current text entry point is within the visible region of the control. > [!NOTE] > 如果控制項沒有焦點，或插入號已置於控制項的可見區域中，這個方法沒有任何作用。This method has no effect if the control does not have focus or if the caret is already positioned in the visible region of the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用列舉型別和方法，以確保之後已按下 ENTER 鍵會在螢幕上看見所插入號，表示文字插入點。The following code example demonstrates how to use the enumeration and the method to ensure that the text insertion point, represented by the caret, is always visible on the screen after the ENTER key has been pressed. 若要執行範例時，將下列程式碼貼中表單，其中包含控制項稱為`TextBox1`和控制項稱為`RichTextBox1`。To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a control called `TextBox1` and a control called `RichTextBox1`. 這個範例需要已與相關聯的事件處理方法事件。This example requires that the event-handling method has been associated with the event. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBaseScrolling#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBaseScrolling/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBaseScrolling#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBaseScrolling/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBaseScrolling#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBaseScrolling/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您想要設定控制項的文字中的第一個字元的開始位置，設定`start`參數為 0。If you want to set the start position to the first character in the control's text, set the `start` parameter to 0. 您可以使用這個方法，以選取的子字串的文字，例如當透過控制項的文字搜尋和取代的資訊。You can use this method to select a substring of text, such as when searching through the text of the control and replacing information. > [!NOTE] > 您可以透過程式設計方式移動插入號文字方塊內設定`start`至您想要將插入號移至，並設定的文字方塊內的位置參數`length`參數的值為零 (0)。You can programmatically move the caret within the text box by setting the `start` parameter to the position within the text box where you want the caret to move to and set the `length` parameter to a value of zero (0). 在文字方塊中必須有焦點將插入號移動。The text box must have focus in order for the caret to be moved. > [!NOTE] > 如果呼叫這個方法時，不含任何參數，則會使用替代方法。If this method is called without any parameters, an alternative method is used. 這個替代的方法繼承自類別。This alternative method inherits from the class. 呼叫時，它會將輸入的焦點設定給控制項，並選取控制項的內容。When called, it sets the input focus to the control and selects the contents of the control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 方法。For more information, see the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用、 衍生的類別，來搜尋單字"fox"的執行個體控制項的內容。The following code example uses , a derived class, to search the contents of the control for the instance of the word "fox". 如果找不到，程式碼會選取該文字在控制項中使用方法。If found, the code selects the word in the control using the method. 這個範例需要名為`textBox1`已建立並將其屬性包含一句 「"快速棕色 fox 跳一段延遲 dog。This example requires that a named `textBox1` has been created and its property contains the sentence "The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog." [!code-cpp[Classic TextBoxBase.Select Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBoxBase.Select Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic TextBoxBase.Select Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBoxBase.Select Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic TextBoxBase.Select Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBoxBase.Select Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在控制項中不選取任何文字，則這個屬性會指出插入點或插入號，新的文字。If no text is selected in the control, this property indicates the insertion point, or caret, for new text. 如果您為控制項中文字的長度超過設定這個屬性，將最後一個字元之後放置選取的開始位置。If you set this property to a location beyond the length of the text in the control, the selection start position will be placed after the last character. 文字方塊控制項中選取文字時，變更這個屬性可能會減少的值屬性。When text is selected in the text box control, changing this property might decrease the value of the property. 如果所指出的位置之後控制項中的其餘文字屬性小於的值屬性、 值屬性就會自動減少。If the remaining text in the control after the position indicated by the property is less than the value of the property, the value of the property is automatically decreased. 值屬性永遠不會造成增加屬性。The value of the property never causes an increase in the property. 您可以透過程式設計方式選取範圍內移動文字方塊藉由設定和屬性。You can programmatically move the selection within the text box by setting the and the properties. 您可以透過程式設計方式移動插入號文字方塊內設定至您想要將插入號移至，並設定的文字方塊內的位置屬性設為零 (0) 的值。You can programmatically move the caret within the text box by setting the to the position within the text box where you want the caret to move to and set the property to a value of zero (0). 必須具有焦點的選取範圍或插入號移動的順序。The must have focus in order for the selection or the caret to be moved. 您可以設定屬性也就是為它指定第一次。You can set the property of a that is by giving it the first. ## Examples **範例 1****Example 1** 下列程式碼範例使用、 衍生的類別。The following code example uses , a derived class. 它提供事件處理常式剪下、 複製、 貼上，執行的物件，以及恢復作業。It provides event handlers for objects that perform Cut, Copy, Paste, and Undo operations. 這個範例需要控制項，名為`textBox1`已建立。This example requires that a control named `textBox1` has been created. [!code-cpp[Classic TextBoxBase.SelectionLength Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBoxBase.SelectionLength Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic TextBoxBase.SelectionLength Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBoxBase.SelectionLength Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic TextBoxBase.SelectionLength Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBoxBase.SelectionLength Example/VB/source.vb#1)] **範例 2****Example 2** 下列範例會設定屬性也就是為它指定第一次。The following example sets the property of a that is by giving it the first. remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制使用屬性來設定界限，如果屬性是`true`和屬性是`false`。The control uses the property to set the bounds if the property is `true` and the property is `false`. 一般而言，對應到範圍中不包含參數`specified`參數傳入其目前值。Typically, the parameters that correspond to the bounds not included in the `specified` parameter are passed in with their current values. 例如， ， ，或或屬性屬性可以傳入控制項的目前執行個體的參考。For example, the , , or the or properties of the property can be passed in with a reference to the current instance of the control. 不過會接受所有傳入的值，而套用至控制項。However all values passed in are honored and applied to the control. `specified`參數代表控制項的項目變更您的應用程式。The `specified` parameter represents the elements of the controls changed by your application. 例如，如果您變更控制項的`specified`參數值是`Size`值。For example, if you change the of the control, the `specified` parameter value is the `Size` value of . 不過，如果調整以回應屬性設定，`specified`參數值是`None`值。However, if the is adjusted in response to the property being set, the `specified` parameter value is the `None` value of .
